description: [INC Ransom](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1032) has used 7-Zip and WinRAR to archive collected data prior to exfiltration.(Citation: Huntress INC Ransom Group August 2023)(Citation: Secureworks GOLD IONIC April 2024)(Citation: SOCRadar INC Ransom January 2024)(Citation: Huntress INC Ransomware May 2024)

Team Huntress. (2023, August 11). Investigating New INC Ransom Group Activity. Retrieved June 5, 2024.
